description: I had never heard of YasT until distro-hopping yet again to end on openSUSE. I was a bit intimidated of the enormity of it, but I am glad to have made the switch. YaSt amazingly includes a suite of packages for network management, adduser functionality, security (in depth) and more. I am still in the process of getting acquainted with it. Will add more observations when not too busy napping.
It allows you to do whatever you want with or without gui. OpenSUSE team has been working on it for years and you can see that they have polished it.
summary: One of the reasons why OpenSUSE is the best linux distro

description: so great, wonder for linux users
summary: Open suse yast is great and i wish this development will continue

description: As comfortable with the command line as I am, I am the kind of person that thinks that linux doesnt need the command line for basic tasks. but i found myself having complex problems with things like drivers because of the wierd hardware in my laptop. the only distro that adopted the new realtek drivers that supported my wifi drivers was openSUSE. and BOY was I glad to find it. I wouldnt have linux any other way. Everything is always up to date, Btrfs by default, and especially, yaST to configure it all. its like the perfect analog to windows control panel, but BETTER. it does EVERYTHING EVER. the GUI for btrfs snapshots, and automated snapshots before and after updates has saved my behind more times than i can count.

summary: One of the best reasons to use opensuse

description: Could be better integrated into KDE Plasma settings, otherwise always practical.

Jamás entenderé cómo no ha sido portado a otras distribuciones.
Es cierto que para un usuario experimentado suele ser más eficiente la consola, pero hay muchas cosas que no recuerdas de memoria, y muchos usuarios que no tienen tanta experiencia en sistemas GNU+Linux a los que les gustaría tener interfaces gráficas para la mayoría de temas de administración del sistema, y ahí es donde creo que Yast no tiene competencia equiparable.

Muy contento con la aplicación.

YaST es una aplicación para la distribución de Linux openSUSE.
que facilita la administración del sistema y la instalación de software,
ami me gustaría que hubiera la opción de instalar el modulo Yast en todas las distros linux, o por lo menos en las principales distribuciones linux por ejemplo: ubuntu, debian, fedora, manjaro, mint.
es un excelente kit de herramientas.
Yast y el Modo Gráfico han hecho a Linux (OpenSUSE) más popular y accesible. La prueba es que muchas personas que usaban Wind:-(ws, hoy estén migrando a una Distro Linux
S'il y a une raison d'utiliser (open)SUSE, c'est Yast!
summary: Excellente application pour la configuration du système

description: YaST2 пока единственный и лучший способ для простого администрирования системы.
